files.name: .markdownlintrc
files.content:
{
  "comment": "https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint",

  "default": true,
  "fenced-code-language": false,
  "heading-increment": false,
  "no-trailing-punctuation": false,
  "line-length": false,
  "MD025": false,
  "MD037": false,
  "MD022": false,
  "MD046": false,
  "MD047": false,
  "MD007": { "indent": 4 }
}

files.name: .travis.yml
files.content:
language: generic

install:
  - npm install -g markdownlint-cli

script:
  - markdownlint README.md

files.name: README.md
files.content:
# Kubernetes Failure Stories

The source code repository for https://k8s.af moved to https://codeberg.org/hjacobs/kubernetes-failure-stories
